plot: In his never-ending quest for the good life, pushy mongrel Charlie attempts to ingratiate himself with his unwilling "master," Porky Pig.
title: Little Orphan Airedale
plot_es: In his never-ending quest for the good life, pushy mongrel Charlie attempts to ingratiate himself with his unwilling "master," Porky Pig.
plot_en: In his never-ending quest for the good life, pushy mongrel Charlie attempts to ingratiate himself with his unwilling "master," Porky Pig.

cast.role: Porky Pig /              Charlie Dog /              Rags McMutt /              City Geek
cast.name: Mel Blanc
